**Source** [Secrets of Magic](/Sources.aspx?ID=96) pg. 170 2.0 **Usage** affixed to armor or a weapon --- A sheen of red crosses the surface of this star-shaped goldstone medallion when the light hits it. The affixed armor or weapon is warm to the touch. The spell attack roll of any spell cast by Activating this item is +7, and the spell DC is 17.
  • **Armor** You gain resistance 2 to fire.
  • **Weapon** After you cast a [fire](/Traits.aspx?ID=72) spell by Activating the _star_, your Strikes with the weapon deal an additional 1d4 fire damage until the end of your next turn.
**Activate** Cast a Spell; **Effect** You cast [_produce flame_](/Spells.aspx?ID=236). Flaming Star **Source** [Secrets of Magic](/Sources.aspx?ID=96) pg. 170 2.0 **Price** 55 gp Flaming Star (Greater) **Source** [Secrets of Magic](/Sources.aspx?ID=96) pg. 170 2.0 **Price** 425 gp --- Resistance when affixed to armor is 5, extra damage when affixed to a weapon is 1d6, the spell attack roll is +14, and the spell DC is 24. **Activate** Cast a Spell; **Frequency** once per day; **Effect** You cast [_fireball_](/Spells.aspx?ID=119). Flaming Star (Major) **Source** [Secrets of Magic](/Sources.aspx?ID=96) pg. 170 2.0 **Price** 1,750 gp --- Resistance when affixed to armor is 10, extra damage when affixed to a weapon is 1d8, the spell attack roll is +19, and the spell DC is 29. **Activate** Cast a Spell; **Frequency** once per day; **Effect** You cast 4th-level [_fireball_](/Spells.aspx?ID=119). **Activate** Cast a Spell; **Frequency** once per day; **Effect** You cast [_wall of fire_](/Spells.aspx?ID=362).
name: Flaming Star (Major)
